briefDirection: Use SQL queries to find the row containing your phone from the “inventory” table. Hint, look at “SELECT all data in a table” and “SELECT specific attributes” in the Guide tab to help you how to do this.
answer: SELECT type FROM inventory WHERE type = "phone";
queries: SELECT type FROM inventory WHERE type = "phone";

briefDirection: Select the top five biggest items from your inventory so Bingus can pack them into a Bag.
answer: SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY size DESC LIMIT 5;
queries: SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY size DESC LIMIT 5;

briefDirection: Investigate the suspects table and look for clues relating to “poptarts” or “rainbows.
answer: SELECT * FROM suspects WHERE notes = "poptarts" OR notes = "rainbows";
queries: SELECT * FROM suspects WHERE notes = "poptarts" OR notes = "rainbows";

briefDirection: Use the suspects table acquired from Doge to check for Meowfia associations.
Check the supermarket table for when it gets its pop tart shipment.
answer: SELECT item, shipmentTime FROM supermarket WHERE item = "poptart";
queries: SELECT item, shipmentTime FROM supermarket WHERE item = "poptart";
